message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond its price.
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While I value your offer, the product's value is considerably higher. Could you consider $13,000?
I understand that the product has value, but $13,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $10,500. Can we meet in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate you trying to find a compromise. How about we settle at $11,500? This is my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $11,000, but no higher. Can you meet me at that price?
